trans-unit.source: Provides data for preprocess input events.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于预处理输入事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消预处理的输入将停止进一步处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 侦听<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>确定另一个处理程序如果取消预处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: The input staging area processes input into [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: 输入的临时区域可处理输入到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]事件。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event handlers are called, even if one of the handlers cancels the input.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>调用事件处理程序，即使其中一个处理程序取消了输入。

trans-unit.source: To verify if a handler further up the tree canceled the input, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证是否处理程序进一步树向上取消输入，侦听<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.PreProcessInputEventArgs> 与使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: Input is processed in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] in the follow stages:
trans-unit.target: 在处理输入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]在以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Pre-process stage.
trans-unit.target: 预处理阶段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 输入管理器引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreProcessInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: Pre-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: 通知前步骤。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 输入管理器引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input event or events are raised.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]引发输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: Post-notify stage.
trans-unit.target: 通知后步骤。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 输入管理器引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostNotifyInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: Post-process stage.
trans-unit.target: 后续处理阶段。

trans-unit.source: The input manager raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput> event.
trans-unit.target: 输入管理器引发<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PostProcessInput>事件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the processing of the input event.
trans-unit.target: 取消处理输入事件。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消预处理的输入将停止进一步处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 侦听<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>确定另一个处理程序如果取消预处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether processing of the input event was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否取消了对输入事件的处理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the processing was canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消了处理操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Canceling a pre-process input stops the input from being processed further.
trans-unit.target: 取消预处理的输入将停止进一步处理的输入。

trans-unit.source: Listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput> to determine if another handler canceled a pre-process input.
trans-unit.target: 侦听<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputManager.PreNotifyInput>确定另一个处理程序如果取消预处理的输入。
